alert.note: Alert for Hennepin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Hennepin County through 415 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eden Prairie, or 13 miles southwest of Minneapolis, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported half in hail in Shakopee. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eden Prairie around 410 PM CDT. Minnetonka, Edina and Hopkins around 415 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
